name: execute-alias-command
title: Execute Alias Command
description: List and execute aliased commands from your shell config. Detach instantly (⌘↩) or run in terminal (⌘⇧↩).
author: felix_wortmann

commands.name: execute-alias-command
commands.title: Execute Alias Command
commands.description: Search and execute shell aliases from your config file. Detach instantly (⌘↩) or run in terminal (⌘⇧↩)

preferences.name: terminalApp
preferences.title: Terminal Emulator
preferences.description: The terminal application to use for commands that require a terminal. Default is 'Terminal'

preferences.name: aliasFilePath
preferences.title: Alias File Path
preferences.description: Path to the shell config file containing aliases. Default is ~/.zshrc

commands.name: manage-running-commands
commands.title: Manage Running Commands
commands.description: View, monitor and terminate processes launched through the Execute Alias Command extension

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
